qoute: Education is that which discloses to the wise and disguises from the foolish their lack of understanding.
A clear understanding of negative emotions dismisses them.
A first sign of the beginning of understanding is the wish to die.
A point of view can be a dangerous luxury when substituted for insight and understanding.
Education is that which discloses to the wise and disguises from the foolish their lack of understanding.
A clear understanding of negative emotions dismisses them.
A first sign of the beginning of understanding is the wish to die.
A point of view can be a dangerous luxury when substituted for insight and understanding.
Anger and intolerance are the enemies of correct understanding.
Anger and intolerance are the twin enemies of correct understanding.
Any affectation whatsoever in dress implies, in my mind, a flaw in the understanding.
Anyone who in discussion relies upon authority uses, not his understanding, but rather his memory.
Aptitude found in the understanding and is often inherited. Genius coming from reason and imagination, rarely.
Conceit is incompatible with understanding.
Darkness within darkness. The gateway to all understanding.
Enthusiasm is the leaping lightning, not to be measured by the horse-power of the understanding.
Everything that irritates us about others can lead us to an understanding of ourselves.
Faith must trample under foot all reason, sense, and understanding.
Gracefulness is to the body what understanding is to the mind.
Humor brings insight and tolerance. Irony brings a deeper and less friendly understanding.
I am against religion because it teaches us to be satisfied with not understanding the world.
I do not want the peace which passeth understanding, I want the understanding which bringeth peace.
I want, by understanding myself, to understand others. I want to be all that I am capable of becoming.
I'm naturally an optimist, but my basis for hope is rooted in my understanding of human nature.
Imagination is a poor matter when it has to part company with understanding.
In this world a great deal of the bitterness amongst us arises from an imperfect understanding of one another.
Is there anything more dangerous than sympathetic understanding?
It is difficult to get a man to understand something when his salary depends upon his not understanding it.
Joy in looking and understanding is the most beautiful gift of nature.
Leadership should be born out of the understanding of the needs of those who would be affected by it.
Marriage always demands the greatest understanding of the art of insincerity possible between two human beings.
Much learning does not teach understanding.
My goal is simple. It is a complete understanding of the universe, why it is as it is and why it exists at all.
My goal is simple. It is complete understanding of the universe, why it as it is and why it exists as all.
Peace cannot be achieved through violence, it can only be attained through understanding.
Perfect understanding will sometimes almost extinguish pleasure.
Power is the by-product of understanding.
Reverie is when ideas float in our mind without reflection or regard of the understanding.
Schizophrenia cannot be understood without understanding despair.
Sir, I have found you an argument; but I am not obliged to find you an understanding.
The greatest dangers to liberty lurk in insidious encroachment by men of zeal - well-meaning but without understanding.
The highest activity a human being can attain is learning for understanding, because to understand is to be free.
The man of understanding finds everything laughable.
The most effective way to destroy people is to deny and obliterate their own understanding of their history.
The noblest pleasure is the joy of understanding.
The power of intuitive understanding will protect you from harm until the end of your days.
The subtlety of nature is greater many times over than the subtlety of the senses and understanding.
The ultimate security is your understanding of reality.
There would be no society if living together depended upon understanding each other.
To study the abnormal is the best way of understanding the normal.
To study the abnormal is the best way of understanding the normal.
To understand one thing well is better than understanding many things by halves.
Truth will always be truth, regardless of lack of understanding, disbelief or ignorance.
Understanding can overcome any situation, however mysterious or insurmountable it may appear to be.
Understanding is a two-way street.
Understanding is nothing else than conception caused by speech.
Understanding reduces the greatest to simplicity, and lack of its causes the least to take on the magnitude.
We accumulate our opinions at an age when our understanding is at its weakest.
We gain our ends only with the laws of nature; we control her only by understanding her laws.
We only labor to stuff the memory, and leave the conscience and the understanding unfurnished and void.
Where there is no extravagance there is no love, and where there is no love there is no understanding.
With age comes the understanding and appreciation of your most important asset, your health.
Words do two major things: They provide food for the mind and create light for understanding and awareness.
Words do two major things: They provide food for the mind and create light for understanding and awareness.
You don't need strength to let go of something. What you really need is understanding.
Your pain is the breaking of the shell that encloses your understanding.
